ValidationRule.description: For a Sites ADR (role contains Sites IS ADR OR Sites ENT ADR), the Sites Account Status must be in an “Offloaded” status in order to drop the account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Sites_Unload_Account__c ), Sites_Unload_Account__c, NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Sites_Account_Status__c,'Offloaded - Unable to connect'), ISPICKVAL(Sites_Account_Status__c,'Offloaded - Made contact, not interested'), ISPICKVAL(Sites_Account_Status__c,'Offloaded - No sites use case'), ISPICKVAL(Sites_Account_Status__c,'Sites open opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(Sites_Account_Status__c,'Sites closed lost opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(Sites_Account_Status__c,'Sites customer'), ISPICKVAL(Sites_Account_Status__c,'Offloading - Potential Partner'))), OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'Sites IS ADR'), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'Sites ENT ADR')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This account can not be dropped. ADRs, please ensure the “Sites Account Status” is an an Offloaded status.
